person.name: Jorge F. Zeballos
person.description: Elder Jorge F. Zeballos was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008, at age 52. At the time of his call, he had been serving as the president of the Chile Concepcion South Mission. He served as a member of the Fourth Quorum of the Seventy, Chile Area, from 1997 to 2004. He is currently serving as a counselor in the Chile Area Presidency.
